config.sql: select distinct a.id, a.createtime "createTime", a.createuserid "createUserId", a.description, a.guid, a.modifytime "modifyTime", a.name, a.url from yl_acc.application a left join yl_acc.application_manager am on am.applicationid = a.id where am.managerid = :userId

select f.id, f.applicationid, f.createtime, f.createuserid, f.description, f.guid, f.method, f.modifytime, f.name, f.parentid, f.type, f.url, f.rightname from yl_acc.function f left join yl_acc.role_function rf on rf.functionid = f.id left join yl_acc.user_role ur on ur.roleid = rf.roleid where f.applicationid = :applicationId and ur.userid = :userId

select app.id, app.guid, app.name, app.iconurl as "iconUrl", app.description, app.status, app.url, string_agg(u.username, ',') as "applicationManager" from yl_acc.application app left join yl_acc.application_manager appm on appm.applicationid = app.id left join yl_acc."user" u on u.id = appm.managerid group by app.id, app.guid, app.name, app.iconurl, app.description, app.status, app.url
